p: In Table 1 the percentages of patients achieving clinical cure for the different thresholds are presented. When comparing thresholds C (ACSS), G (adapted FDA), and H (adapted EMA), clinical cure was found in 45.2%, 47.6%, and 50.1% of patients at visit 2; in 81.5%, 83.2%, and 84.1% of patients at visit 3; and in 95.0%, 95.2%, and 95.6% of the patients at visit 4.
